description: This source file defines a DashboardFragment class which is a UI component in an Android app. It sets up the dashboard view, initializes view models, and observes state updates to update the UI accordingly.

classes.name: DashboardFragment
classes.description: A Fragment that displays a dashboard UI, observing view model state and updating UI components accordingly.

methods.name: onCreateView
methods.description: Inflates the fragment's layout when the view is created.

methods.name: onViewCreated
methods.description: Initializes UI components and starts observing the view model's state to update the UI.
